The given summary talks about Harry Kane's 20th Premier League goal of the season, which is a significant achievement. The video titled "Harry Kane - PFA Player of the Year?" showcases Kane's remarkable performance in the Premier League, competing against other exceptional players like Eden Hazard and Alexis Sanchez.

The aspect highlights that Harry Kane has been nominated for two prestigious awards: PFA Player and Young Player of the Season. The PFA Player of the Year is awarded to the player who has performed exceptionally well throughout the Premier League season, while the Young Player of the Year is given to the best young player (under the age of 23) in the league.

These awards acknowledge Harry Kane's outstanding performance and contributions to his team, Tottenham Hotspur. His success in the Premier League this season has made him a strong contender for both the PFA Player and Young Player of the Season awards.
